subject.IP_Name: Enter the names of your favorite games, novels, movies, or TV shows.
subject.description: A visually striking, masterpiece-level 3D New Year's greeting card poster based on [IP Name]. Vertical composition with a deep, window-like groove in the center.
subject.material_style: Felt and coarse knitting wool texture, realistic and delicate, blind box toy texture.

central_character.identity: A cute Q-version felt Pony (representing the Year of the Horse)
central_character.expression: Naive and charming (憨态可掬), festive
central_character.clothing: Red festive vest, traditional tiger-head hat
central_character.action: Standing in the center as a festival messenger

secondary_characters.identity: Classic characters from the IP (Q-version felt style)
secondary_characters.clothing: Traditional festive Tang suit or Hanfu
secondary_characters.action: Interacting within the scene, adding story elements

scene_elements.architecture: Iconic buildings from the IP in Q-version felt, arranged with depth and layers
scene_elements.vegetation: Peach tree or Kumquat tree hung with red lanterns, Chinese knots, and blessing cards
scene_elements.props: Scattered felt firecrackers, gold ingots, snow-covered shrubs

title_design.structure: Independent 3D volumetric letters suspended in mid-air (No background plate/card)

main_text.font_style: 3D fluid art font, thick glass volume

sub_text.font_style: Bold Chinese Calligraphy (中国书法), 3D extruded strokes

material_properties.type: Matte Frosted Glass (applied directly to the text volume)
material_properties.color: Deep red to light red gradient
material_properties.optical_effects: Dreamy colorful caustics casting shadows onto the felt scene below

bottom_layout.content: Random classic quote related to New Year, blessings, or hope
bottom_layout.font_style: Large, elegant Western Handwritten Serif, rich ink color
bottom_layout.source_note: Small Chinese font citing the source

photography.lighting: Soft and uniform, breathing light effect, atmospheric depth
photography.texture_quality: Masterpiece, rich details, mixture of felt and frosted glass

background.setting: Oriental ink wash void environment with flowing light mist
background.colors: Elegant pale champagne gold or high-grade soft mist red
external_decor: Red velvet silk ribbons dancing in the air
background.positioning: Card appears suspended in clouds with soft shadow at the bottom

the_vibe.culture: Chinese New Year, Year of the Horse
the_vibe.aesthetic: High-end commercial design, Cuteness mixed with elegance
